original: SOFTWARE PC QUOTE 6.0-TM- for Windows on the Internet is a software application that displays market data information, provided via the digital Hyperfeed, in the form of quotes, charts, graphs, tables, board views, tickers and other analytical tools.
ollama_generated:
SOFTWARE PC QUOTE 6.0-TM- for Windows on the Internet serves as an online tool that presents market data, sourced through the digital Hyperfeed, in various formats including quotes, charts, graphs, tables, board views, and tickers. However, it is essential to note that while we strive to ensure the accuracy of this information, it is provided on an 'as-is' basis, with no assurance or warranty regarding its completeness or precision.

In case of any discrepancies or errors in the data presented, the responsibility for taking corrective action shall lie solely with the user, who is advised to verify all market data independently before making any decisions based on it.

original: B.  [***]  Notice expressing a desire to terminate this Agreement will be sent by certified mail to the address indicated above.  Said termination will be effective as of the last day of the month in which this anniversary occurs.
ollama_generated: C. Termination of this Agreement may be initiated by providing written notice, delivered via registered mail, to the address provided herein. The termination shall take effect on the first day of the subsequent month following the delivery of such notice, allowing for a grace period within the current month.

original: C.  All payments will be made in US Dollars drawn on a US bank.  ABW will provide a complete list of all clients using the format described in Schedule B with each payment.
ollama_generated: C. Payments shall be remitted in US Dollars, but may be transferred through a non-US bank, provided it has an established correspondent relationship with a US banking institution. In this case, ABW will supply a list of clients, including those utilizing alternative payment methods, using the format specified in Schedule B for each transaction. This adjustment allows for flexibility in payment processing while maintaining transparency and compliance with legal requirements.

original: 5. Exchange Authorization A.   The ABW hereby acknowledges and agrees that the HYPERFEED provided under this Agreement contains market information obtained, selected and consolidated by PCQ under the authority of various agencies, including but not limited to, the New York Stock Exchange, American Stock Exchange, Pacific Stock Exchange, Midwest Stock Exchange, Chicago Board Options Exchange, the Options Price Reporting Authority, the Consolidated Tape Association, Chicago Board of Trade, Chicago Mercantile Exchange/International Monetary Market, Kansas City Board of Trade, Minneapolis Grain Exchange, Commodities Exchange Center, New York Futures Exchange, Mid-America Commodity Exchange, and Consolidated Canadian Group and that the ABW's use of the service for internal or external redistribution of date is authorized and regulated by said agencies.
ollama_generated:
5. Authorization for Data Usage

A. The HYPERFEED recipient, ABW, acknowledges and agrees to the following: The market information contained within this Agreement's HYPERFEED is obtained, selected, and consolidated by PCQ under the authority of various agencies, such as the New York Stock Exchange, American Stock Exchange, Pacific Stock Exchange, Midwest Stock Exchange, Chicago Board Options Exchange, the Options Price Reporting Authority, the Consolidated Tape Association, Chicago Board of Trade, Chicago Mercantile Exchange/International Monetary Market, Kansas City Board of Trade, Minneapolis Grain Exchange, Commodities Exchange Center, New York Futures Exchange, Mid-America Commodity Exchange, and Consolidated Canadian Group. The ABW is responsible for ensuring compliance with the regulations governing their internal or external redistribution of data as enforced by these agencies.

original: C.   LIABILITY UNDER THIS AGREEMENT FROM ANY AND ALL CAUSES, INCLUDING, BUT NOT LIMITED TO, PROGRAM MALFUNCTION OR OPERATIONAL NEGLIGENCE, SHALL BE LIMITED TO GENERAL MONEY DAMAGES IN AN AMOUNT NOT TO EXCEED THE TOTAL CHARGES PAID BY ABW FOR THE SERVICES DURING THE MOST RECENT TWELVE (12) MONTHS OF THE AGREEMENT. SUCH LIMITATION SHALL BE THE EXTENT OF PCQ OR ABW'S LIABILITY REGARDLESS OF THE FORM IN WHICH ANY LEGAL OR EQUITABLE ACTION MAY BE BROUGHT AGAINST PCQ OR ABW, AND THE FOREGOING SHALL CONSTITUTE PCQ'S OR ABW'S SOLE REMEDY.  IN NO EVENT WILL EITHER PARTY BE RESPONSIBLE FOR LOST PROFITS OR SPECIAL INDIRECT, INCIDENTAL OR CONSEQUENTIAL DAMAGES WHICH ABW OR PCQ INCUR OR EXPERIENCE ON ACCOUNT OF ENTERING INTO OR RELYING ON THIS AGREEMENT, EVEN IF PCQ OR ABW HAS BEEN ADVISED OF THE POSSIBILITY OF SUCH DAMAGES.
ollama_generated: D. The extent of liability incurred under this Agreement for any and all causes, such as program malfunction or operational negligence, is capped at compensatory monetary damages. This cap shall not exceed the aggregate fees paid by ABW for the services during the twelve (12) months preceding the commencement of any legal or equitable action against PCQ or ABW. The liability limit will apply regardless of the nature or form of any claim, and the aforementioned constitutes the sole remedy available to either party. Under no circumstances shall either party be held responsible for lost profits or special, indirect, incidental, or consequential damages that may arise as a result of ABW or PCQ entering into this Agreement or relying on its provisions, even if such damages were reasonably foreseeable.

original: C.   PCQ acknowledges the confidential nature of ABW's use of the SOFTWARE and HYPERFEED during the initial term of this agreement.  Due to the unannounced platform on which ABW shall make available its electronic service to its client during this initial term, PCQ shall in no way disclose to other parties the substance nor acknowledge the existence of this agreement.  Any advertising or disclosure of the relationship between the parties, use of either's marks, names or reference by the other shall be approved by both parties prior to release.
ollama_generated: C. It is acknowledged by PCQ that the use of ABW's SOFTWARE and HYPERFEED, during the initial term of this agreement, holds a confidential nature. Given the proprietary nature of the platform on which ABW will make its electronic service accessible to clients during this period, PCQ agrees not to reveal the specifics nor confirm the existence of this agreement to any third parties. Prior approval from both parties is required before either party can publicize or disclose their relationship, utilize each other's marks, names, or reference one another in any manner.

original: 2.   Any and all claims, liabilities, or obligations resulting from ABW's misrepresentations, negligence, willful misconduct, breach of warranty or non-performance of any of the covenants or obligations under this Agreement or from any misrepresentations or omissions made by ABW to PCQ, including specifically, but not limited to, any authority required of ABW pursuant to Section 6 hereof.

original: 11. Applicable Law and Venue This Agreement shall be interpreted, construed and enforced in all respects in accordance with the laws of the State of Illinois , except with regards to its rules regarding choice of law.  Each party irrevocably consents to the jurisdiction of the courts of the State of Illinois and the federal courts situated in the State of Illinois, in connection with any action to enforce the provisions of this Agreement, to recover damages or other relief for breach or default under this Agreement, or otherwise arising under or by reason of this Agreement.
ollama_generated: 11. Applicable Law and Jurisdiction: This Agreement shall be governed, construed, and adjudicated in accordance with the laws of the State of Illinois, excluding its choice of law principles. Each party unconditionally submits to the jurisdiction of the courts within the State of Illinois and the federal courts stationed within that state, acknowledging their authority to preside over any action relating to the enforcement or interpretation of this Agreement; the recovery of damages or other relief in case of breach or default under this Agreement; or any disputes arising from or related to this Agreement. This submission to jurisdiction is irrevocable and binding, regardless of where either party may reside at the time of a potential dispute.

original: 12. Severability and Survival A.   Whenever possible, each provision of this Agreement shall be interpreted in such manner as to be effective and valid under applicable law, but if any provision of this Agreement shall be prohibited by or invalid under applicable law, such provision shall be ineffective to the extent of such prohibition or invalidity, without invalidating the remainder of such provision or the remaining provisions of this Agreement.
ollama_generated: 12. Flexibility and Persistence A. In compliance with legal requirements, every term of this Agreement will be construed to comply with applicable law whenever possible. However, should any provision within this Agreement conflict with applicable law, such conflict shall not affect the rest of the provision or the remaining provisions in their entirety, but rather the conflicting part shall be deemed null and void, while the validity and enforceability of the remainder of the Agreement remain unaffected. In case a court finds any term or portion of this Agreement unenforceable, the parties acknowledge that they intend for the court to replace such unenforceable term with a valid provision that most closely reflects the original intent and economic benefits of the unenforceable term.

original: B.   The provisions dealing with indemnification and confidentiality and any other section of this Agreement, unless specifically stated otherwise, which may reasonably be interpreted or construed as surviving the completion, expiration, termination or cancellation of this Agreement, shall survive the completion, expiration, termination or cancellation of this Agreement.
modified: A. Exceptions Made: Sections pertaining to indemnification, confidentiality, and any other provisions within this Agreement that could be reasonably interpreted or construed as remaining applicable, will persist even if this Agreement is completed, expires, terminates, or is canceled, unless otherwise explicitly specified in writing.

original: B.   Any notice, approval, request, authorization, direction or other communication under this Agreement shall be given in writing and shall be deemed to have been delivered and given for all purposes, (i) on the delivery date if delivered personally to the party to whom the same is directed, or (ii) three business days after the mailing date, whether or not actually received, if sent by registered U.S. mail postage and charges prepaid, to the address of the party to whom the same is directed as set forth in the introductory paragraph of this Agreement.  Either party may change its address specified above by giving the other party notice of such change in accordance with this Section 13.B.
ollama_generated:
A. Any notice, approval, request, authorization, direction, or other communication required under this Agreement shall be made in writing and will be considered effectively transmitted and received, (i) immediately upon delivery if handed over personally to the recipient party, or (ii) five business days following the mailing date, regardless of receipt, when sent by registered U.S. mail with prepaid postage to the address provided for each party in this Agreement's initial paragraph. It is the responsibility of both parties to promptly notify each other of any updates to their addresses as specified above, in accordance with Section 13.A.

This modification places a slightly longer timeframe for communication delivery and shifts the responsibility of timely address notification from one party to both parties equally.
